p:
There is conflicting evidence on CQ/HCQ in COVID-19 regarding the available clinical studies to date. The European Medicines Agency (EMA) published a list of observational studies on CQ/HCQ in COVID-19 patients on 29 May 2020.
54 Although this is not an inclusive list of all the studies conducted so far, it provides an excellent reference to many current studies on COVID-19.
